item.title: The First Descendant: How To Get High Voltage Bunny Module
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Get High-Voltage Module In The First Descendant
  • What Does High-Voltage Module Do In The First Descendant

The First Descendant has plenty of modules for players to hunt down, with Transcendent Modules affecting gameplay more than any of the others. One such Module is High-Voltage , which can be utterly devastating with the right build.

Players will want to get their hands on at least one of each of these Transcendent Modules so they can explore how they affect their relevant Descendants, and if these changes are something they would like to make a dedicated build around.

How To Get High-Voltage Module In The First Descendant

Unlike The First Descendant 's Electric Condense Module, which can be used on both Bunny and Ultimate Bunny , High-Voltage can only be used by Ultimate Bunny. Players who want to get their hands on this module will want to progress through the game’s story until they can tackle the Pyromaniac Void Intercept on Hard. As this enemy is resistant to Electric and Fire damage and can be very daunting to fall, here are some tips to help you clear this fearsome enemy.

  • Use Ice Elemental damage.
  • Increase your Fire resistance.
  • Use long-range weapons such as Scout Rifles.
  • Dispatch smaller enemies.
  • Aim for the rod in its back when it appears.

This enemy is slow-moving, so if you can keep your distance and maneuver around, you’ll spike your survivability. The smaller enemies will drop ammo when they die, so dispatching them whenever you see them will ensure that you never run dry on all your clips.

An ideal weapon for taking down colossi is the Tamer machine gun , so be sure to go and get a Tamer before doing this fight, as it will speed things along. Lastly, it is always a good idea to bring some friends along, so if nobody you normally play with is online, you should consider doing this Void Interception on Public. Allies can revive one another to keep their total lives high; meanwhile, going down in solo puts the mission 1 step closer to failure.

Don’t dismantle your Ultimate and Transcendent Modules . Instead, use the Combine option for a chance at getting new Transcendent Modules. This may not be as reliable as dedicated methods, but there is still a chance you’ll get Transcendent Modules you don’t yet have. You can get a result of a Transcendent Module from 3 Ultimate Modules and 1 Transcendent Module, but there is a chance you will get an Ultimate Module instead. Four Transcendent Modules guarantee a random Transcendent Module.

What Does High-Voltage Module Do In The First Descendant

Players who have unlocked The First Descendant 's Ultimate Bunny will know she shares a skill set with her non-ultimate counterpart. The skills that this Module will be augmenting are Thrill Bomb and Lightning Emission . Lighting Emission normally creates a ring of lighting that pulses outward from where Bunny is. The more she moves around, the more pulses will trigger. High-Voltage will change it so that these skills can only hit a certain number of enemies at a time. However, it increases the damage and range of both these skills. Overall, this can make farming faster, and deal more damage to bosses in less time.

item.title: Once Human: Hale's Moving House World Event Guide
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Where To Find Hale's Moving House In Once Human
  • Finding Hale's Moving House Consciousness Fragments In Once Human

Once Human's world is full of weird anomalies. Some are hostile, while others aren't as aggressive. The so-called Hale's Moving House falls under the latter category, and it's mostly there to give players something fun to discover while still giving out useful rewards.

Hale's Moving House (officially referred to as the Migrant in-game) is much like the walking bus you sometimes see on the road. Finding and completing its challenge rewards you with loot. Incidentally, it's a great way to get Acid in Once Human , so if you're in need of this resource, you best get to hunting this house.

Where To Find Hale's Moving House In Once Human

The most reliable way to find the house the first time around is to do a sidequest in Tall Grass Inn called Strange Empty House . This quest is given by Jeremiah, an NPC by the riverbank near the inn. You can only start this quest after finishing the main quests from Mary in Tall Grass Inn. Finish the Requiem quest from Claire too, if the Strange Empty House still isn't available after completing Mary's tasks.

After accepting the quest from Jeremiah, you'll be able to see all the possible spawn points of the moving house on your map marked in blue. There are four locations as of writing, so stock up on some fuel for your vehicle before heading out because there's going to be a lot of driving involved.

Finding Hale's Moving House Consciousness Fragments In Once Human

Once you do find the house, simply go through the front door. You'll see a trio of arms sprouting up from the first floor — shoot it, and the house will wake up. After the short cutscene, jump out of the house, and start shooting the arms with the glowing fireflies on its belly. Doing this will cause the house to fall. You can jump back on top of it by using the updrafts that spawn nearby.

Back inside the house, the three arms on the first floor will come back to life. Shoot them again, and three fireflies will scatter across the house. Scan the area by pressing Q, and look for the firefly signatures. Shoot all three of them, and a chest will spawn on the trio of arms. From the chest, you'll get some Stardust Source, Controllers, 210 units of Acid, and the Disco Ball Deviant.

Keep in mind that this is a weekly chest . It's unclear when the exact reset date is, but it's safe to assume that it will reset whenever the game enters a new weekly stage.

item.title: Fallout 76: How To Get & Use Gift Wrap
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Gift Wrap in Fallout 76
  • How to Use Gift Wrap in Fallout 76

As the Nuclear Winter update fully sets in again for Fallout 76 , a lot of players will want to take part in the Holiday Scorched community event. With this, you will be able to get the limited-time item, Gift Wrap, which can only be found in particular locations in the game, and can be used to make some special items.

If you are currently unsure of where you can get this special crafting item, and what exactly it can be used for, this guide will show you everything you need to know about Gift Wrap. Here's how to add some to your inventory.

How to Get Gift Wrap in Fallout 76

As players begin their adventure through the Holiday Scorched community event, they will be able to get the rare crafting component, Gift Wrap. Although you can only get this item for a limited time, you might be wondering where exactly it can be picked up.

At the moment, Gift Wrap can be found through two different methods: either it can be dropped after defeating some Festive Scorched enemies , or you can purchase it from Vendor Bots around the map and through Grahm . Grahm is a special vendor that can be found in various locations, occasionally at the Monongah Power Plant fast-travel spot, or other random encounter locations. To make things easier, we recommend just visiting a Vendor Bot, which can be found in various areas, including:

  • Vendor Bot Bob - Found at the Flatwoods in the western region of the map, south of Vault 76
  • Vendor Bot Chad - Found at Camden Park in the southwestern region of the map, south of Kanawha Nuka-Cola Plant
  • Vendor Bot Phoenix - Found at the Watoga Shopping Plaza in the southeastern region of the map, south of the Ranger District Office

If you want to take out some Festive Scorched instead, you can check out our guide to easily locate the enemies. Morgantown Airport is always a great spot to find some Scorched, so we recommend visiting this spot first. Keep in mind that not every Scorched in the area will be Festive Scorched, however.

How to Use Gift Wrap in Fallout 76

Once you have some Gift Wrap in your possession, you can use this item to create small, medium, and large Holiday Gifts . You will need the following ingredients to make these at a Tinker's Workbench:

  • Small Holiday Gift: 2x Adhesive, 1x Low-Quality Gift Wrap
  • Medium Holiday Gift: 2x Adhesive, 1x Medium-Quality Gift Wrap
  • Large Holiday Gift: 2x Adhesive, 1x High-Quality Gift Wrap

Keep in mind that Low-Quality Gift Wrap costs 288 Caps , Medium-Quality costs 863 Caps , and High-Quality costs 2530 Caps . Once you make a Holiday Gift, however, you can get some of the following items at random:

  • Communist Commander Outfit
  • Tulip Sky Blue Pant Suit
  • Plan: Mounted Glowing One Head
  • Plan: Mounted Honey Beast
  • Plan: Santa Crash
  • Plan: Deer Skull
  • Plan: Nuka Girl Area Rug
  • Plan: Vault 51 Jumpsuit
  • Plan: .44 Blue Camo Paint
  • Plan: Princess Castle Pink Sleeping Bag
  • Plan: Condemned Notification Sign
  • Plan: Behemoth Plushie

item.title: Dungeonborne: How to Change Controls & Keybinds
item.description:
Dungeonborne is the latest souls-like dungeon crawler that challenges you to beat monsters, traps, and other players before safely extracting your hard-earned loot. With different weapons, attacks, and skills ranging from class to class, you must be quick to mash the correct keys to pull off timely combos. That, however, is only efficient when you are playing with controls you are comfortable with. Here is how to remap your keyboard controls in Dungeonborne if the default settings are proving to be a bit troubling.

How to Change Controls and Remap Keys in Dungeonborne

Dungeonborne has an optional tutorial section that lets you run a small dungeon to understand the basics. It is an excellent opportunity to learn how to attack, use a shield, execute special skills, and most importantly, consume healing items to boost your survival chances. However, for reasons unknown, the tutorial does not allow you to change your controls in Dungeonborne . You need to either complete or skip the tutorial before being able to remap your controls from the campsite.

The tutorial allows you to tinker with your graphics settings. If your PC does not meet the recommended system requirements for Dungeonborne , jump into the tutorial anytime from the main menu to experiment with lower settings.

When you reach the campsite, open the menu screen by pressing Escape or clicking the compass-like icon in the top-left corner. Head into Settings, and you will see a tab for Mouse and Keyboard. Select it to open a range of options to adjust your sensitivity, toggle custom key bindings, and remap controls in Dungeonborne .

Dungeonborne saves a config file that contains all of your settings. It can be found in C:\Users\Your-User-Name\AppData\Local\Dungeonborne\Saved\Config\Windows.

Something else to note, especially for Nvidia users, is that the F1 key cannot be remapped in Dungeonborne , at least not at the time of writing. Pressing F1 pulls up your character list. However, it is also the default key for taking screenshots in the Nvidia GeForce Experience app. This is probably a mistake that should be fixed in future patches. For the time being, you can either remap your screenshot key or grab a screenshot every time you want to switch characters.

Dungeonborne does not officially support controllers. While you can remap your keyboard controls to your controller through Steam, the custom controls fail to work in most cases when playing Dungeonborne .

item.title: Roblox: Golf Frenzy Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Golf Frenzy Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Golf Frenzy
  • How to Get More Golf Frenzy Codes

Golf Frenzy! is one of the many great sports simulation games on the Roblox platform. Since its release, it's racked up more than ten million visits and continues to attract attention to this day, thanks in large to the tireless efforts of the developers who regularly update the game.

The aim is simple: complete courses in as few strokes as possible and become the very best. Doing so will unlock new cosmetic items, although there are other ways to get one's hands on these. Roblox players can redeem Golf Frenzy! codes to get chests containing random cosmetics.

All Golf Frenzy Codes

Working Golf Frenzy Codes

  • VISITS100K - Redeem code for Exclusive Chest
  • LIKES250 - Redeem code for Exclusive Chest

Expired Golf Frenzy Codes

  • There are currently no expired Golf Frenzy codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Golf Frenzy

The process needed to redeem codes in Golf Frenzy is incredibly simple and not unlike the ones found in many other popular Roblox games. However, for those who are new to the platform, the following step-by-step instructions should prove to be useful.

  1. Launch Golf Frenzy .
  2. Click on the blue bird icon on the left side of the screen.
  3. Type or paste one of the working Golf Frenzy codes from the list above into the code box.
  4. Hit the blue Redeem button to claim your rewards.

How to Get More Golf Frenzy Codes

The best place to find new Golf Frenzy! codes is right here, as we'll regularly update the list above to ensure that you never miss out. Alternatively, fans of the game can follow the lead developer on Twitter, or join the Golf Frenzy! Discord server by clicking on the invitation below. As well as learning about new Roblox promo codes, the latter is also a great way to get news about future updates and events and connect with like-minded players.

  • Golf Frenzy! Discord Server
  • Andrew Hamilton's Twitter Account
